trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when an action is tried on a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> that has been deleted.
To delete a <xref:System.Data.DataRow>, use the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete%2A> method of a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> class.
trans-unit.target: Per eliminare un <xref:System.Data.DataRow>, utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete%2A> metodo di un <xref:System.Data.DataRow> classe.

trans-unit.source: As soon as you have deleted a row, any attempts to modify it will generate the <xref:System.Data.DeletedRowInaccessibleException>.
trans-unit.target: Come si elimina una riga, qualsiasi tentativo di modifica genererà il <xref:System.Data.DeletedRowInaccessibleException>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DeletedRowInaccessibleException> is thrown when you use one of the following properties or methods that try to get or set the value of a deleted <xref:System.Data.DataRow>:
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.DeletedRowInaccessibleException> viene generata quando si utilizza una delle seguenti proprietà o metodi che tenta di ottenere o impostare il valore di una classe eliminata <xref:System.Data.DataRow>:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Item%2A> property
<xref:System.Data.DataRow.ItemArray%2A> property
<xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> method
Use the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> class to determine whether a row has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> di un <xref:System.Data.DataRow> classe per determinare se una riga è stata eliminata.

trans-unit.source: If it has been deleted, you can use the <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion.Original> field to retrieve it because deleted rows have no values available for the <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion.Current> state.
trans-unit.target: Se è stato eliminato, è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion.Original> campo da recuperare, poiché le righe eliminate non dispongono di valori disponibili per il <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion.Current> dello stato.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.DeletedRowInaccessibleException" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.DeletedRowInaccessibleException" /> class.
Use the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> class to determine whether a row has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> di un <xref:System.Data.DataRow> classe per determinare se una riga è stata eliminata.

trans-unit.source: The string to display when the exception is thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.DeletedRowInaccessibleException" /> class with the specified string.
Use the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> class to determine whether a row has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> di un <xref:System.Data.DataRow> classe per determinare se una riga è stata eliminata.

trans-unit.source: The data that is required to serialize or deserialize an object.
Description of the source and destination of the specified serialized stream.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.DeletedRowInaccessibleException" /> class with serialization information.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.DeletedRowInaccessibleException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
Use the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> class to determine whether a row has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> di un <xref:System.Data.DataRow> classe per determinare se una riga è stata eliminata.
